resources.string: Nearby Service includes Nearby Data Communication and Contact Shield. Nearby Data Communication allows apps to easily discover nearby devices and set up communication with them using technologies such as Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. HMS Core Contact Shield is a basic contact tracing service developed based on the Bluetooth low energy (BLE) technology.
Nearby Message allows a user to subscribe to messages published by nearby users or from nearby beacons. Nearby Message provides app-based and beacon-based message publishing and subscription.

• Respect user privacy, and remind users not to publish sensitive information when using the Nearby Message feature.
• Explicitly tell users that the Nearby Message service requires the Bluetooth broadcast and scanning function, which may increase power consumption of their devices.
• Upon app exit, you need to call unput(Message) of the MessageEngine class to unpublish messages and unget(xxx) of the MessageEngine class to unsubscribe from messages.
• Please comply with applicable data protection laws and regulations when collecting and processing personal data, identifying users, taking rights as a data subject, and performing other relevant operations.
• You are responsible for storing users' device and network identifiers properly. HUAWEI Nearby Service does not store any device or network identifiers.
• Do not publish or subscribe to messages without notifying users. Explicitly provide the functions of unpublishing and unsubscribing from messages.

string.name: text_click_more_info_nearbymessage
string.u: Click here to get more information about Nearby Message.

resources.string: if your device is connected Wi-Fi, click Share Wi-Fi
If you are not connected Wi-Fi, click Connect Wi-Fi
